ya10.3.6:1.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha so domanassindriyaṃ pajahissatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:2.1: « Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ pajahissati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānitthāti? No.
ya10.3.6:3.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:4.1: « Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānitthāti? No.
ya10.3.6:5.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:6.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānitthāti? No.
ya10.3.6:7.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṃ parijānittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:8.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati so cakkhundriyaṃ parijānitthāti? No. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṃ.)
ya10.3.6:9.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:10.1: « Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṃ pajahitthāti? No.
ya10.3.6:11.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:12.1: Dve puggalā domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha, no ca aññindriyaṃ bhāvessanti. Anāgāmī domanassindriyañca pajahittha aññindriyañca bhāvessati.
ya10.3.6:13.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṃ pajahitthāti?
ya10.3.6:14.1: Cha puggalā aññindriyaṃ bhāvessanti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha. Anāgāmī aññindriyañca bhāvessati domanassindriyañca pajahittha.
ya10.3.6:15.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:16.1: Arahā domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati. Dve puggalā domanassindriyañca pajahittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:17.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati so domanassindriyaṃ pajahitthāti?
ya10.3.6:18.1: Cha puggalā aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissanti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ pajahittha. Dve puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti domanassindriyañca pajahittha. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṃ.)
ya10.3.6:19.1: » Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha so aññindriyaṃ bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:20.1: Dve puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha, no ca aññindriyaṃ bhāvessanti. Pañca puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha aññindriyañca bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:21.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ bhāvessati. So anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.6:22.1: Dve puggalā aññindriyaṃ bhāvessanti no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha. Pañca puggalā aññindriyañca bhāvessanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha.
ya10.3.6:23.1: » Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:24.1: Arahā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati. Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:25.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.6:26.1: Dve puggalā aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ bhāvittha. Cha puggalā aññātāvindriyañca sacchikarissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca bhāvittha. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṃ.)
ya10.3.6:27.1: » Yo aññindriyaṃ bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissatīti? No.
ya10.3.6:28.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ sacchikarissati so aññindriyaṃ bhāvitthāti? No. (Aññindriyamūlakaṃ.)
ya10.3.6:29.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissatīti?
ya10.3.6:30.1: Pañca puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissanti. Cattāro puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti.
ya10.3.6:31.1: « Yo vā pana domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissati so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.6:32.1: Arahā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahissati, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha. Cattāro puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahissanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha.
ya10.3.6:33.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:34.1: Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti. Aṭṭha puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:35.1: « Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.6:36.1: Arahā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessati, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha. Aṭṭha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha.
ya10.3.6:37.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:38.1: Satta puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti. Dve puggalā cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:39.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.6:40.1: Arahā aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessati, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha. Dve puggalā aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha.
ya10.3.6:41.1: » Yo cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:42.1: Aṭṭha puggalā cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:43.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati so cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānitthāti?
ya10.3.6:44.1: Arahā aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati, no ca cakkhundriyaṃ na parijānittha. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti cakkhundriyañca na parijānittha. (Cakkhundriyamūlakaṃ.)
ya10.3.6:45.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:46.1: Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti. Cha puggalā domanassindriyañca nappajahittha anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:47.1: « Yo vā pana anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.6:48.1: Tayo puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha. Cha puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvessanti domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
ya10.3.6:49.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:50.1: Cha puggalā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyañca nappajahittha aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:51.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.6:52.1: Dve puggalā aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti domanassindriyañca nappajahittha.
ya10.3.6:53.1: » Yo domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:54.1: Cha puggalā domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te domanassindriyañca nappajahittha aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:55.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati so domanassindriyaṃ nappajahitthāti?
ya10.3.6:56.1: Arahā aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati, no ca domanassindriyaṃ nappajahittha. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti domanassindriyañca nappajahittha. (Domanassindriyamūlakaṃ.)
ya10.3.6:57.1: » Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessatīti?
ya10.3.6:58.1: Dve puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti.
ya10.3.6:59.1: « Yo vā pana aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.6:60.1: Dve puggalā aññindriyaṃ na bhāvessanti, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te aññindriyañca na bhāvessanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha.
ya10.3.6:61.1: » Yo anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:62.1: Dve puggalā anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:63.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati so anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.6:64.1: Arahā aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati, no ca anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ na bhāvittha. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti anaññātaññassāmītindriyañca na bhāvittha. (Anaññātaññassāmītindriyamūlakaṃ.)
ya10.3.6:65.1: » Yo aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha so aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissatīti?
ya10.3.6:66.1: Aṭṭha puggalā aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha, no ca aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissanti. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te aññindriyañca na bhāvittha aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti.
ya10.3.6:67.1: « Yo vā pana aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati so aññindriyaṃ na bhāvitthāti?
ya10.3.6:68.1: Arahā aññātāvindriyaṃ na sacchikarissati, no ca aññindriyaṃ na bhāvittha. Ye puthujjanā maggaṃ na paṭilabhissanti te aññātāvindriyañca na sacchikarissanti aññindriyañca na bhāvittha. (Aññindriyamūlakaṃ.)
